CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter the room . MOT holds CHI and then walks over and puts him down on the floor
INV explains warm-up task to MOT . CHI stands and looks at the toys on the floor and MOT sits across from him
CHI looks up at the door as INV leaves
CHI looks down at the floor
CHI rocks the chair next to him
MOT squeezes the duck the stops and sits back
MOT looks at the duck then up at CHI
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
MOT crawls forward towards the other toys
MOT sits back and looks at CHI
CHI struggles to lift the ball up
MOT sits back and looks at CHI
CHI picks up the ball and throws it over his head
MOT looks at CHI and opens her mouth wide
CHI looks down at the ball
MOT bends down as she looks at CHI
CHI walks over and picks up the toy duck . <aft> CHI sits on the floor and examines the rubber duck

MOT pulls the toy car away from CHI
MOT rolls the toy car back and forth in front of CHI

CHI holds the duck up in the air and watches MOT

CHI pulls the clown up by the head

the latch doesn't catch and the jack+in+the+box pops

INV enters the room to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT
INV takes the toys from Warm-up and has CHI sit at the table in a sassy seat
INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place .
INV re-enters to explain the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table .
INV gives CHI the squeeze toy with the brush to hold . CHI squeezes the toy and pays no attention to INV
MOT puts the object on the table
CHI looks up at the object
INV sets the object in motion
CHI tries to touch the object
MOT leans forward and looks at the object then at CHI
CHI looks back at the object

CHI looks down towards the base of the object then up towards INV
MOT looks at INV then at CHI
CHI reaches out for the object with the toy
CHI tries to grab the object with his other hand

CHI looks down at the toy

CHI glances up at the object then looks down at the brush toy
MOT leans down and looks at CHI and lets go of the brush
CHI plays with the brush toy vigorously then stops
INV takes the object off of the table
MOT sits back and looks at INV
INV puts the Object away in the desk drawer and closes it
INV tells MOT about the Parent Child Interaction Boxes . MOT takes CHI out of the seat and takes away the toys from Small Scale Activity
